Uses of Class
graphpack.local.Client

Packages that use Client
graphpack.local local service, client and node abstractions (bridge design pattern) 
graphpack.local.persistence abstract persistence implementors (bridge design pattern) 
graphpack.local.persistence.JDO3 contains concrete JDO 3.0.1 implementations of IClientStore, INodeStore and IEdgeStore
